mapper.select: SELECT t.customer_skill_id, t.skill_item_id, t.skill_name, t.discount_price, t.service_unit, t2.skill_voice_url, t2.skill_voice_time, t3.back_color as skill_back_color, t3.font_color as skill_font_color FROM customer_skill t LEFT JOIN customer_skill_certify t2 ON t2.certify_id = t.certify_id LEFT JOIN skill_item t3 ON t3.id = t.skill_item_id WHERE t.customer_id = #{customerId} AND t.skill_status = 1 ORDER BY t.create_time ASC

SELECT l.label_name FROM order_evaluation_label e INNER JOIN evaluation_label l on l.label_id = e.label_id WHERE e.customer_id=#{customerId} AND e.skill_item_id=#{skillItemId} GROUP BY e.label_id ORDER BY count(e.label_id) desc , e.evaluation_time desc LIMIT 0,3

SELECT t.customer_id, t.customer_skill_id, t.skill_item_id, t.skill_name, t.discount_price, t.service_unit, t2.skill_voice_url, t2.skill_voice_time, t3.back_color as skill_back_color, t3.home_black_color as skill_home_black_color, t3.font_color as skill_font_color, t4.nick_name as customer_nick_name, t4.sex as customer_sex, t4.birthday as customer_birthday FROM customer_skill t LEFT JOIN customer_skill_certify t2 ON t2.certify_id = t.certify_id LEFT JOIN skill_item t3 ON t3.id = t.skill_item_id LEFT JOIN customer t4 ON t4.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.customer_skill_id = #{customerSkillId} AND t.skill_status = 1
